\subsubsection{Certificate}
\label{sec:entity-certificate}

Certificate entity representing formal certification records issued by certification bodies

\begin{informative}[title=Entity Relationships]
This entity references the following entities:
\begin{itemize}
    \item \field{CertificationSchemeId} → \entity{Certification Scheme} (Uses EntityNameId convention referencing CertificationScheme)
    \item \field{CertificationBodyId} → \entity{Certification Body} (Uses EntityNameId convention referencing CertificationBody)
    \item \field{OrganizationId} → \entity{Organization} (Uses EntityNameId convention referencing Organization receiving the certificate)
    \item \field{VerificationStatementId} → \entity{Verification Statement} (Uses EntityNameId convention referencing VerificationStatement for third-party validation)
\end{itemize}
\end{informative}

\input{tex/entities/certificate-table}
